author: Andy Richardson
comment: I like the idea! Would really love it if the text was vertically aligned... It doesn't look too good on my Ticwatch E with text right at the top and lots of blank space below it.

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Thank you for your review. Hopefully the latest update fixed your issues

author: Agent OmegaXSS
comment: Love it on my LG Urbane 2nd edition using 2.0!  thanks keep up the good work! Soon I'll buy the python and JavaScript watch face

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your review. I'm pleased it's working Nicely. I have been playing with complication spots, but not gotten quite right. It's intended for next update. Thank you.

author: Lazar Pantovic
comment: Great app!! Love it and have been using it every day for a year!! Can we get an update?

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: I'm pleased you've been loving the watchface. Now I've finished on my other project. I've been begun working on update but it might take longer than I anticipated. I'm having to do a lot of rewriting of the watch face. Hopefully though the update will be out soonish.

author: Egon Lampert
comment: Nice watchface.. But it would be cool if its possible to change user and hostname

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content:
Thanks for the review. Pleased you like it, it is possible to change between user and root. Those options are available.
I've been toying with the idea of adding companion app. To add even more Customisation. The core reason the host name is locked. Is for sizing purposes. But I'd like to implement the ability to set your own at some point.

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Thank you for your review. Pleased your enjoying it

comment: Nice watch face, can you add one tap to get battery and weather information? Thanks

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Thank you for your review. I'm pleased you like it. I'd like to work out a weather system. However it seems to have a detrimental affect on the battery life. I'm trying to find a medium where it is an acceptable drain, but can be fully turned off, if people don't want weather.

author: Luke Addison
comment: Nice watch face. Font sizes don't seem to be working on Sony Smart watch SWR50 though

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your review. I'm sorry for the font sizes not working for you. I've tested the face on my friend's SWR50 and it seems to be working for him? Please be aware it's difficult to notice the change in font from small-medium. But could you please confirm that you are able to set other customisations? Thank you.

author: Caleb Crook
comment: This app won't work on my moto 360, but if it did would be awesome

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Hello. Thank you for getting in touch. I've recently had a similar issue with another face I use on my Moto 360. I Disconnect the watch in app. Turned off. Turned back on. Reconnected the synced apps. Or something like that. And the  I got all faces to work. I really hope that helps

author: Peter van der Meulen
comment: Nice watchface. Why no monospace font though?

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: I struggled to fit all the text in using monospace so I had to use a different one I'm afraid.

author: Ben Bertrand
comment: where can I set a greater font? Installed on Huawei watch...Thank you for the good news to wait for an update!

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Thank you for your review. The update is done and out. I hope it fixes your problem. Please be aware there is a setting to adjust the year length now as well.

title: Looks nice

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Thank you so much for your review :). I'm glad you like it.

author: Colin Mahns
comment: Love the look of this on my ZenWatch 2. Only complaint is that on the ZenWatch the text is a bit hard to read due to the displayed font being small and thin. If there's a way you can get the text to be one font size bigger and/or bold text this would be perfect :)

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content: Has the latest update fixed your issue? Thank you for your review :). There is now a setting that lets you adjust the font size. :). I hope it fixes your issue.

title: Great watchface

author: Ashley Sykes
comment: Love it. Can you do a JavaScript style face.

reply.author: Archtects Productions
reply.content:
Thank you for your review. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=archtectsproductions.watchfacejavascriptcode
I'm pleased to announce that I've made a Js watch face available :). Was rather difficult to get right.
